full_summary:
===============

**Title:** Temporary Help Services - Solicitation S5228810

**Reference Number:** CB-518-27435974

**Tender Status:** Open

**Publication Date:** November 19, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** December 4, 2024, 1:00 PM EST

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Category:** Service

**Description:**

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services. This requirement is open to qualified supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870, who have expertise in policy and advisory services, specifically special advisor.

**Selection Criteria:**

The selection criteria for this solicitation is Lowest Price.

**Important Notes:**

* Suppliers generated from the CPSS who are qualified under the listed streams and categories have been invited to submit a proposal.
* The DND requires resources with a minimum security level of SECRET.
* This solicitation is only open to the listed potential bidders.

**Document Links:**

* The solicitation document is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52141/s5228810---method-1---lowest-price-responsive---rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52141/s5228810---method-1---lowest-price-responsive---rfp.pdf)
* The solicitation document in French is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52141/s5228810---method-1---dp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52141/s5228810---method-1---dp.pdf)

**Contact Information:**

* CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

The rewritten text includes the essential information from the original document, while maintaining a professional tone and concise formatting. The text has been reformatted in Markdown for better readability. The changes made include:

* The formatting of the text has been rearranged for better flow and clarity.
* The terms "Temporary Help Services" and "Request for Proposal" have been used consistently throughout the document.
* The list of invited suppliers has been omitted, as it is
